data.text: @Lowcountry1Girl @JoeLovesFL Are they friggin mental.The way covid was handled was the biggest mistake/fraud in medical history. Shameful for anyone with 1/2 a clue about infectious disease who is not in bed with 1 party/the other. masks will now go silently because they should have never have been mandatory
@Lowcountry1Girl He had nothing to do with it.  President Trump said it would eventually go away.  It just took longer then expected.
@Lowcountry1Girl @SPepper1964 Why are healthcare workers still required to vax and mask?
